sections.heading: agency, defined.State agency shall include every state office, department, board, commission, regulatory entity, and agency of the state and, when provided specifically by law to be a state agency for purposes of this section, programs and activities involving less than the full responsibility of a
sections.text: agency, defined.State agency shall include every state office, department, board, commission, regulatory entity, and agency of the state and, when provided specifically by law to be a state agency for purposes of this section, programs and activities involving less than the full responsibility of a state agency.SourceLaws 1985, LB 407, ยง 20;Laws 1991, LB 81, ยง 5.
